A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While The Force Awakens left me wanting more\, this movie just left me wanting The Force Awakens back.  The only reasons i enjoyed this at all were because of the fight scenes\, and Poe dameron.  Rose\, a new character they seemed to think was a good idea\, was a complete burden on the movie.  Rey's story really didn't change enough\, and since Snoke died\, it laves you wondering how they will even work out a plot for number 9.  I recommend seeing it\, not because it is a good movie\, just so you will be able to understand the next movie\, which shall hopefully be more impressive
